attributes.action: Women & supporters of women's rights, don't want Trump to visit our Queen.
attributes.additional_details:
I am an artist and sculptor and educator. I have raised three children alone and succeeded in my life with the support of the laws of our land which protect the rights of women. I work two jobs as a tutor of sculpture in schools and communities, i also support speech and language therapy programs for young adults in a supported learning environment. 
Every day since 20th January, i have watched with horror the anti-progressive, backward actions of this US administration. Is this who WE are?
attributes.background: Trump's administration has begun a massive campaign to erode women's rights in the US. The UK has a proud history, progressing the rights of women. Stop his influence, condoned by this state sponsored visit and save our Queen the indignity of shaking the hand of a self confessed woman abuser.
